adjectives.description: bounden (comparative more bounden, superlative most bounden)

definitionGroups.group: (transitive, archaic, rare) past participle of bind.

entries.meaning: (intransitive, archaic, specifically) To be obliged; to be under a duty or obligation (to do something).
